description:
A thief is scary, a wolf is scary, but the worst is the Furuya Flora, two children fight a witch, and a painter learns a lesson.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furuya no Mori / Ryojin Uma / Anyo ni Karasu
The Furuya Forest / The Traveler`s Horse / A Crow in the Dark of Night
ふるやのもり / 旅人馬 / 闇夜にカラス
